name: spo-export-sitecollection-permission-with-subwebs
title: Get SharePoint Site Collection and their Subwebs Permissions And Export It To CSV
shortDescription: This script sample shows how to get permission for site collection with their subwebs and export it to CSV with some required details
longDescription: This sample read site url from user and get permissions for the site collection and subwebs and then export it to CSV with some required details

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
